Captain Mathias:
The Stakatos have become more aggressive lately. This is probably due to their Leader who has a taste of their own kind. Consuming the flesh of the Stakato seems to produce a chemical that causes intense aggression. It sends them in a fury to attack all those around. We don't have a scientific name for him, we just call it the Cannibalistic Stakato Chief. Once you have taken care of this creature be sure to remove and bring me back the Cannibalistic Stakato Chief's Claw as proof you have finished the assignment.
